channel.title: Why is my FTP so slow?
channel.description: Today I just reinstalled Windows from a Dell disc and decided I wanted professional edition instead, so I started torrenting it. Then, my new website got approved, so I downloaded the SMF installer and started to upload it, the only problem is that it's going insanely slow, like < 1Kb/s. Could my 400 KB/s Torrent be doing this? Or did I fuck up my machine? I installed all the drivers correctly and used Ron's TCP/UDP optimizer. Any clues?

item.title: Why is my FTP so slow?
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

[quote=“RXVL, post:12, topic:135976”][quote author=The Un-Named link=topic=187461.msg1694393#msg1694393 date=1187861055]
I assume your using a free host? FTP is slow because the server sucks, or too many people are uploading.
[/quote]

And why would I use a free host? How dare you slander me with such insulting words. lol, I’m on 1and1’s business package and normally the FTP is extremely fast, but it’s all fixed now.[/quote]

RXVL:

website got approved

I thought you might be using NationVoice hosting or something.

Read full topic
item.source: Why is my FTP so slow?

item.title: Why is my FTP so slow?
item.dc:creator: @RXVL RXVL
item.description:
@RXVL wrote:

Thats why I remove them from my list, I hate being seeded from.

Read full topic
item.source: Why is my FTP so slow?

item.title: Why is my FTP so slow?
item.dc:creator: @Fasga Fasga
item.description:
@Fasga wrote:

Keep in mind, the point of torrents it for everyone to share their bits. Meaning, you will probably be uploading data to other downloaders. This’ll kill your upload speed, if there are enough people leaching from you.

Read full topic
item.source: Why is my FTP so slow?

item.source: Why is my FTP so slow?

item.title: Why is my FTP so slow?
item.dc:creator: @goatee goatee
item.description:
@goatee wrote:

Are you guys on ethernet or something? BT broadband in the UK I get about 100kb/s max.

At my dads (cable) I get like 1800kb/s (depends on where I’m downloading from). Fellixombc, when you download off a torrent or something, do you actually get like 15mb/s coming through? If so that’s crazy shizzle!

Read full topic
item.source: Why is my FTP so slow?

item.title: Why is my FTP so slow?
item.dc:creator: @tL tL
item.description:
@tL wrote:

Well, this may seem stupid but i used to use the FTP client that you can install as an add on for firefox, that was slow.

Now i used CoreFTP and it seems alot faster than my old client, maybe its just coincidence though?

Read full topic
item.source: Why is my FTP so slow?

item.title: Why is my FTP so slow?
item.dc:creator: @Heaven Heaven
item.description:
@Heaven wrote:

You never know, it could be the optimizers fault too.
I only have about 2000 more k/bs then you, and i’ve downloaded 4 torrents at once and didn’t notice a single drop in speed.

Read full topic
item.source: Why is my FTP so slow?

When I am downloading something with torrents, my speed gets completely raped. I can’t even connect to limewire while a torrent is downloading.
